channel.title: Adding Interfaces Server Side?
channel.description: Hello, I have made an interface to help me with debugging and logging errors and have packaged it in my cache. I can load the interface correctly in game but I cannot interact with it. I am using a RuneSource base and i believe there is packet checking that works with the cache that is stored server sided. Anyway, I added the "AtActionType" as 1 so I [i]should[/i] be able to click the interface, and when I load the interface I do have the ability to click the button. In ButtonPacketHandler, I have my server's debug mode on and I have it to print out what has been clicked and all the interfaces send the packet ID but when i click the buttons on my interface nothing happens, and the cases i have added do not work. So I tried to add the interface to the cache server side but still nothing. I am more than sure this is server sided so that's why I posted this in this section. Thank you :D

item.title: Adding Interfaces Server Side?
item.dc:creator: @ProTayToe ProTayToe
item.description:
@ProTayToe wrote:

Hello, I have made an interface to help me with debugging and logging errors and have packaged it in my cache. I can load the interface correctly in game but I cannot interact with it. I am using a RuneSource base and i believe there is packet checking that works with the cache that is stored server sided. Anyway, I added the “AtActionType” as 1 so I should be able to click the interface, and when I load the interface I do have the ability to click the button. In ButtonPacketHandler, I have my server’s debug mode on and I have it to print out what has been clicked and all the interfaces send the packet ID but when i click the buttons on my interface nothing happens, and the cases i have added do not work. So I tried to add the interface to the cache server side but still nothing. I am more than sure this is server sided so that’s why I posted this in this section. Thank you

Read full topic
